about_the_game:
b]You will spend one incredible day with Hannah.[/b]

Hannah is a modern girl who wants to make music. But she can’t get any understanding or support from her parents.

One day Hannah puts on her favorite music and the world around her starts changing rapidly! And so do her skills - they grow with each new turn of the skateboard wheels. But you need to be careful - fears and stereotypes imposed by society haunt her even here.

Will Hannah be able to avoid getting lost in her own fantasies, gain confidence and make her dream of playing music come true?

This is for you to decide!

Your aim

Complete the levels by solving all the puzzles and help Hannah to get her friends together to participate in a music contest.

Features and capabilities of One Day More

  • Rich visuals in the Supremacist style
  • Exploring the relevant topic of self-realization
  • Stylized puzzles of various complexity
  • Traditional platform views: side and third-person
  • The ability to explore various locations by riding a skateboard around them
  • The ability to collect original achievements
  • The ability to ride a skateboard on the ceiling

short_description: An exciting skateboarding adventure awaits you in the fantasy world of a girl named Hannah! One Day More is a game about gaining self-confidence and coping with inner problems.
